resources.string: Quizz

You got it!
Saturn Has seven Rings.
Pluto is a dwarf planet.
Space is continuously expanding.
Mars Is Known as the blue planet or sister of earth.
Asteroid belt is found between earth and Jupiter
Comets Are made of snow, ice and dust
Phobos and debits are moons of Venus
SUN is made up from hydrogen and carbon dioxide gas.
Uranus moon names are oberon and Titania
Buzz Aldrin\'s mother\'s maiden name was \"Moon\".
Electrons are larger than molecules.
Water is an example of a chemical element.
The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on Earth.
The chemical make up food often changes when you cook it.
Sharks are mammals
The human body has four lungs.
Atoms are most stable when their outer shells are full.
Filtration separates mixtures based upon their particle size.
Conductors have low resistance.
Molecules can have atoms from more than one chemical element.
An average ear of corn has odd number of rows
The popsicle was invented by an 11-year old.
Froot Loops are all the same flavor.
French fries were made in Greece.
It can take up to 10 years for an avocado to fully grow.
Supermarket apples can be a year old.
No matter what color Fruit Loop you eat, they all taste the same
Chimichurri is a green sauce that originated in Mexico.
Tequila is made from the blue agave plant.
Baby carrots are actually regular carrots that have just been cut down to a small size.
